summary: A configurable plugin that wraps PyTorch’s TorchDynamo compiler, allowing a model to be compiled with a selected backend, execution mode, graph granularity, and dynamic‑shape handling, while also supporting custom backend options and a disable switch for testing.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily apply TorchDynamo compilation to their PyTorch models to improve runtime performance, tune execution strategies, and control compilation behavior in production or test environments.
